advanced.title: Advanced settings
advanced.description: Tune request-level controls. Defaults are safe for most runs.

timeout.label: Request timeout (seconds)
timeout.tooltip: How long to wait before failing a request. Default 30s. Keep between 5–120s depending on model latency.
timeout.helper: Default: 30s. Higher values trade speed for reliability.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.tooltip: 0–1 range. Higher temperature = more creative, less consistent responses.

maxTokens.label: Max tokens
maxTokens.tooltip: Upper bound on generated tokens. Typical range: 16–1024 depending on response length.
maxTokens.helper: Default: 512. Smaller caps return faster, shorter answers.

topP.label: Top P
topP.tooltip: Probability mass to sample from (0–1). Lower values focus on the most likely tokens.
topP.helper: Default: 1. Combine with temperature for finer control.

retries.label: Retry attempts
retries.tooltip: How many times to retry on transient failures. Default 2. Keeping within 0–5 avoids long waits.
retries.helper: Default: 2 retries for flaky network/model responses.
